feed.title: URL-to-PNG Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for URL-to-PNG: v1.4.0
entry.content: chore: bump nodejs v12 to v20 chore: bump aws sdk from v2 to v3 chore: bumps all dependencies

entry.title: New release for URL-to-PNG: v1.5.0 - Local filesystem caching
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat: add local filesystem storage provider by @jasonraimondi in https://github.com/jasonraimondi/url-to-png/commit/813d05b8332e6c8f0b8d759fd7fcdf1a83dca243
  • feat: add aws endpoint support, improve aws naming conventions by @jasonraimondi in https://github.com/jasonraimondi/url-to-png/commit/3c4cc29551dc203c4235420c6e4b0eb5cd4addc2
  • ci: Use GITHUB_OUTPUT envvar instead of set-output command by @arunsathiya in https://github.com/jasonraimondi/url-to-png/pull/27

New Contributors

  • @enstyled thanks to for requesting some useful feature requests
  • @arunsathiya automated their first contribution in https://github.com/jasonraimondi/url-to-png/pull/27

Full Changelog: https://github.com/jasonraimondi/url-to-png/compare/v1.4.2...v1.5.0

entry.title: New release for URL-to-PNG: v2.0.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat: app test suite ðŸŽ‰ - link
  • feat: add documentation site - link
  • feat: add optional /metrics endpoint for prometheus / autoscalers - link
  • feat: add optional server encryption - link
  • feat: add a bunch more server configuration options including log level, pool configurations, cache control, etc.
  • refactor: rewrite removing nestjs by @jasonraimondi in https://github.com/jasonraimondi/url-to-png/pull/36
  • esm + typescript + decorators = headache and rewriting to hono was just more fun and easier
  • docs: update README.md with the updated AWS variables by @enstyled in https://github.com/jasonraimondi/url-to-png/pull/32

Breaking Changes

  • The default port has switched from 3000 to 3089. To keep using port 3000, use PORT=3000
  • AWS_ACCESS_KEY has been replaced with AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID
  • AWS_SECRET_KEY has been replaced with AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY
  • AWS_REGION has been replaced with AWS_DEFAULT_REGION

New Contributors

  • @enstyled made their first contribution in https://github.com/jasonraimondi/url-to-png/pull/32

Full Changelog: https://github.com/jasonraimondi/url-to-png/compare/v1.5.0...v2.0.0
